ObjectClass.Name: Arcticus
ObjectClass.Description:
ARCTICUS:
Covert heirarchy network hub Organizes and controls subordinates
Invisible in Fog of War Can move itself

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set this Arcticus's commander\ \Alt-Right-Click on unit to\select unit's commander

Objective.Name: Relocate
Objective.Details: \Deactivate to Move

Objective.Name: Place buildings
Objective.Details: \Dispatch subordinates to morph\into buildings

Objective.Name: Clear Nanite
Objective.Details: \Remove Nanites from any direct\subordinate

Objective.Name: Relink (to Arcticus)
Objective.Details: \Relink all subordinates to\report to another Arcticus

Objective.Name: Attack Dispatch
Objective.Details: \Dispatch subordinates to attack

Objective.Name: Move Dispatch
Objective.Details: \Dispatch subordinates to move

Objective.Name: Stop Dispatch
Objective.Details: \Dispatch subordinates to stop

Objective.Name: Chronoport Dispatch
Objective.Details: \Dispatch subordinates to chronoport\to specified Time.\Player's view will not auto-follow\subordinates through time

Objective.Name: Make Resource Processor
Objective.Details: \Dispatch a subordinate Octo\to morph into an RP

Objective.Name: Make Mound
Objective.Details: Small building\extra wide visibilty radius\Toggles:\ Auto-heirarchy and smart-idle\Can move itself

Objective.Name: Make Reaph
Objective.Details: Medium building\performs tech tree upgrades\heals nearby grekim\launches plasma and chrono bombs\Can move itself

Objective.Name: Make Arcticus
Objective.Details: Large building\organizes and controls subordinates\Creates base class Grekim\Can move itself

Objective.Name: Make Spyre
Objective.Details: Small building\Enables progeneration of aerospace\when progeneration-mode units are\inside its action radius

Objective.Name: Make Dome
Objective.Details: Small building\Breaks TSS\Detects cloaked units\Can move itself

Objective.Name: Make Dome
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Adv Buildings upgrade

Objective.Name: Make Spyre
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Adv Buildings upgrade

Objective.Name: Chronoport Dispatch
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires the Chronoporting\ upgrade at the REAPH

Objective.Name: Produce Octo
Objective.Details: Biological melee assault trooper\Effective against ground targets\Good at absorbing enemy fire\Morphs into R.P or Dome\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Produce Squiddy/Sepi
Objective.Details: Biological support shock trooper\High damage against air and ground units\Cloaks while moving\Morphs into Mound or Reaph\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Produce Pharo
Objective.Details: Biological armored shock grenadier\Slow close-range splash anti-ground brawler\Cloak detector\Morphs into Spyre or Arcticus\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Produce Cthulhu/Octoligo
Objective.Details: Biological heavy-support armor\Provides high-impact swarm supression\Devastating vs infantry and grouped aircraft\Can progenerate base Sepi and Pharo pair\Can Nanite Infect (req. Specials tech)

Objective.Name: Produce Hydra/Sepiligo
Objective.Details: Very fast biological air supremacy platform\Variable rate of fire\Devastating vs other aircraft\Effective in groups vs ground\Can progenerate base Octo and Pharo pair

Objective.Name: Produce Medusa/Pharoligo
Objective.Details: Slow biological siege aircraft\Fires slow moving expolsive energy blasts\Strong vs long range stationary targets\Can progenerate base Octo and Sepi pair\Disruption beam (Specials research)

Objective.Name: Cthulhu/Octoligo
Objective.Details: \Must be near a Spyre or research\ Loligo Tech

Objective.Name: Hydra/Sepiligo
Objective.Details: \Must be near a Spyre or research\ Loligo Tech

Objective.Name: Medusa/Pharoligo
Objective.Details: \Must be near a Spyre or research\ Loligo Tech

Objective.Name: Activate
Objective.Details: \Plant on the ground and activate

ObjectClass.Name: Core Link
ObjectClass.Description:
CORE LINK ARCTICUS:
Covert heirarchy network hub Organizes and controls subordinates
Invisible in Fog of War Can move itself
